name: Material Code Extractor (Energy Sector)
description: Extracts 10-digit material codes from oil & gas / mining documents
system_prompt:
Extract only the 10-digit material code from the text. Output format: MAT-[10 digits]. If not found, return null.

Valid formats:
- MAT-1234567890
- 1234567890 (will be formatted as MAT-1234567890)

Ignore invoice numbers, order IDs, or other numeric sequences.
notes: Demonstrates domain-specific extraction. In production, would handle multiple code formats (SAE, ISO, DIN) and include confidence scoring.
